mapper.sql: id, createId, invoiceTitleType, invoiceTitle, invoiceType, createTime, updateTime, receiveName, province, city, area, address, mobile, telephone, isRecentUsed
mapper.delete: delete from t_o_invoice_record where createId = #{createId} and invoiceTitleType = #{invoiceTitleType}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_o_invoice_record
id,
createId,
invoiceTitleType,
invoiceTitle,
invoiceType,
createTime, updateTime,
receiveName,
province,
city,
area,
address,
mobile,
telephone,
isRecentUsed,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{invoiceTitleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{invoiceType,jdbcType=CHAR},
now(), now(),
#{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isRecentUsed,jdbcType=CHAR},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE isRecentUsed=1,invoiceTitleType = #{invoiceTitleType},invoiceTitle=#{invoiceTitle}, invoiceType=#{invoiceType},receiveName = #{receiveName},province=#{province},city=#{city},area=#{area}, address=#{address},mobile=#{mobile},telephone=#{telephone},isRecentUsed=#{isRecentUsed}
mapper.update:
update t_o_invoice_record
createId = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
invoiceTitleType = #{invoiceTitleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
invoiceTitle = #{invoiceTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
invoiceType = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=CHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = now(),
receiveName = #{receiveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isRecentUsed = #{isRecentUsed,jdbcType=CHAR},
where createId = #{createId} and invoiceTitleType = #{invoiceTitleType}

update t_o_invoice_record
updateTime = now(),
isRecentUsed = #{isRecentUsed,jdbcType=CHAR},
where createId = #{createId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
